alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 11 at 8:20PM CST until January 11 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN SEBASTIAN AND EAST CENTRAL LE FLORE COUNTIES... At 820 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Howe, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Greenwood... Heavener... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Midland... Washburn... Excelsior... Burnville... Patterson... Arkola... Crossroads... Witcherville... Dayton... Milltown... Heavener Runestone Park... Hodgen... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
